ai-thag5.12:1.1_0: Whatever wise one, understanding their teacher’s words,
ai-thag5.12:1.2_0: stays with them, their fondness growing;
ai-thag5.12:1.3_0: that astute person is indeed devoted—
ai-thag5.12:2.2_0: one who does not tremble, but reflects instead,
ai-thag5.12:2.3_0: that astute person is indeed strong—
ai-thag5.12:3.2_0: their wisdom is deep, they see the subtle meaning;
ai-thag5.12:3.3_0: that astute person is indeed immovable—
ai-thag5.12:4.1_0: learned, a memorizer of the teachings,
ai-thag5.12:4.2_0: living in line with the teachings—
ai-thag5.12:4.3_0: that astute person is indeed such—
ai-thag5.12:5.1_0: They know the meaning of what is said,
ai-thag5.12:5.3_0: that astute person is indeed a master of meaning—
ai-thag5.12:5.7_0: The Book of the Fives is finished.
ai-thag5.12:6.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
ai-thag5.12:6.4_0: like a golden statue in Gayā river.
ai-thag5.12:7.4_0: Now there are senior monks here who are twelve senior
